title: Wiley and MarkLogic: Three Very Different Successes
abstract: Wiley originally chose MarkLogic to build our Wiley Content Repository: to store journal and book content in XML and serve platforms like Wiley InterScience, our research library delivery platform. Given our good experience with MarkLogic, both the tool and the company, we again went to MarkLogic to build Wiley Custom Select, our awardwinning custom textbook tool. Soon after, when Wiley was planning our replacement platform for InterScience, MarkLogic was selected as a key technology solution for not only as the content store, but also the search engine as well as the application engine for serving more than five million journal articles, 8,000 online books, and 150 reference works now available via Wiley Online Library.
